mapper.sql: id, create_by AS createBy, create_time AS createTime, del_flag AS delFlag, update_by AS updateBy, update_time AS updateTime, description, name, parent_id AS parentId, type, sort_order AS sortOrder, component, path, title, icon, level, button_type AS buttonType, status
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.name, p.title, p.path, p.icon, p.type, p.component, p.level, p.button_type, p.parent_id, p.sort_order, p.description, p.status FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC
